narrative.title: Deutsches Afrikakorps - 1941Q3
narrative.situation: German Panzer Corps deployed in North Africa - Libya/Egypt Border during 1941Q3.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored corps for offensive and defensive operations in North Africa
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
